summary: Well that depends on how they tackle it, but it is a justifiable concern since politics, SJW crap tarnishing everything and the...
caption: Well that depends on how they tackle it, but it is a justifiable concern since politics, SJW crap tarnishing everything and the source of current conflicts, so there is a real risk for them to risk their product for a subject that it’s now causing social discord. Fortunately CDproject red is a polish studio, and polish people have common sense.

reblog.comment: Well that depends on how they tackle it, but it is a justifiable concern since politics, SJW crap tarnishing everything and the source of current conflicts, so there is a real risk for them to risk their product for a subject that it’s now causing social discord. Fortunately CDproject red is a polish studio, and polish people have common sense.

trail.content_raw: Well that depends on how they tackle it, but it is a justifiable concern since politics, SJW crap tarnishing everything and the source of current conflicts, so there is a real risk for them to risk their product for a subject that it’s now causing social discord. Fortunately CDproject red is a polish studio, and polish people have common sense.
trail.content: Well that depends on how they tackle it, but it is a justifiable concern since politics, SJW crap tarnishing everything and the source of current conflicts, so there is a real risk for them to risk their product for a subject that it’s now causing social discord. Fortunately CDproject red is a polish studio, and polish people have common sense.

summary:
#Cyberpunk2077 tiene 10 escritores; Las pandillas no serán villanos de cómic

Hablando con la revista oficial de PlayStation...
caption:
#Cyberpunk2077 tiene 10 escritores; Las pandillas no serán villanos de cómic

Hablando con la revista oficial de PlayStation (septiembre de 2018, número 152), Stanisław Święcicki, que ha sido escritor en CD Projekt RED desde 2013, habló sobre el equipo de escritures para Cyberpunk 2077 y el proceso creativo detrás de ello.

summary: Cyberpunk 2077 - Над сюжетной частью работает десять авторов
title: Cyberpunk 2077 - Над сюжетной частью работает десять авторов
body: Сценарист Станислав Свенцки работает в CD Projekt RED с 2013 года. Он дал интервью журналу PlayStation Magazine, где рассказал подробности творческого процесса Cyberpunk 2077 и о работе писателей: «У нас около восьми-десяти человек. На данный момент … Читать дальше »

summary: “You know, he’s strange. It feels like there’s two persons inside of his mind.”  “Does it matter? He’s doing his job well,...
caption:
“You know, he’s strange. It feels like there’s two persons inside of his mind.”

“Does it matter? He’s doing his job well, that’s all I want to know.”

Or Cyberpunk 2077 AU, where 39 year old android (combination of RK800 and 900) is working as mercenary.

Also - a katana AU!

summary: Cyber Shock Episode 2: Underappreciated Cyberpunk Gems
title: Cyber Shock Episode 2: Underappreciated Cyberpunk Gems
body:
Due to recording issues you’ll notice that Hamish’s audio isn’t coming through until around 12 minutes in, apologies for that!

In this episode Banana Chan, Kira Magrann, Hamish Cameron, and Fraser Simons talk about unappreciated gems of cyberpunk. Some are little known, some underrated, and some just deserve more love. From novels to anime to movies.

Things discussed: Upgrade, Sense8, Johnny Mnemonic, Almost Human, Continuum, Mardock Scramble, Remember Me, The Red Strings Club, He, She & It, Storming the Reality Studio, The Glitch Logs, Cybernetic Punk, All Systems Red, Darling in the Franxx,

summary:
CD Projekt Red: Cyberpunk is ‘Inherently Political’ 

In an interview with this month’s edition of Official Xbox Magazine,...
caption:
CD Projekt Red: Cyberpunk is ‘Inherently Political’

In an interview with this month’s edition of Official Xbox Magazine, Patrick Mills — a quest designer for Cyberpunk 2077 — explains that, in the team’s eyes, Cyberpunk as a genre is “inherently political” and that overall, the IP is “an inherently political franchise” as a result. 

Go look!

https://www.hardcoregamer.com/2018/07/30/cd-projekt-red-cyberpunk-is-inherently-political/307425/

Go look!

tags: gonna have to wait and see
summary: Cyberpunk 2077 quest designer says it's 'inherently political'
title: Cyberpunk 2077 quest designer says it's 'inherently political'
excerpt: Also discusses why they've made their new RPG first-person.
description: “Cyberpunk 2077 is a game about people with power at the top and people at the bottom with none”, he replied. “That power can come from money, hierarchies, technology and violence. The original Cyberpunk 2020 setting, like the setting of The Witcher stories, was a complex critique of the author’s world, and we don’t shy away from that in our games. On the contrary I think it’s one of the things that sets us apart […] Cyberpunk is an inherently political genre and it’s an inherently political franchise.”

reblog.comment: “Cyberpunk 2077 is a game about people with power at the top and people at the bottom with none”, he replied. “That power can come from money, hierarchies, technology and violence. The original Cyberpunk 2020 setting, like the setting of The Witcher stories, was a complex critique of the author’s world, and we don’t shy away from that in our games. On the contrary I think it’s one of the things that sets us apart […] Cyberpunk is an inherently political genre and it’s an inherently political franchise.”

trail.content_raw: “Cyberpunk 2077 is a game about people with power at the top and people at the bottom with none”, he replied. “That power can come from money, hierarchies, technology and violence. The original Cyberpunk 2020 setting, like the setting of The Witcher stories, was a complex critique of the author’s world, and we don’t shy away from that in our games. On the contrary I think it’s one of the things that sets us apart […] Cyberpunk is an inherently political genre and it’s an inherently political franchise.”
trail.content: “Cyberpunk 2077 is a game about people with power at the top and people at the bottom with none”, he replied. “That power can come from money, hierarchies, technology and violence. The original Cyberpunk 2020 setting, like the setting of The Witcher stories, was a complex critique of the author’s world, and we don’t shy away from that in our games. On the contrary I think it’s one of the things that sets us apart […] Cyberpunk is an inherently political genre and it’s an inherently political franchise.”

summary: Cyberpunk 2077 Will Be Political And Focus On Social Commentary, According To Quest Designer
title: Cyberpunk 2077 Will Be Political And Focus On Social Commentary, According To Quest Designer
body:
Cyberpunk 2077 Will Be Political And Focus On Social Commentary, According To Quest Designer | #Cyberpunk #Cyberpunk2077 #Cyberpunk2020

A lot of gamers have realized that politics in video games have become a bane for the quality of the game itself. Almost every single recent game to dive head first into politics has turned out to be a ham-fisted, preachy piece of propaganda. Whenever a developer says their game will be “political”, most gamers retort with groans. Well, CD Projekt Red’s quest designer, Patrick Mills, has…

View On WordPress

summary: CD Projekt RED detalla el contexto político de Cyberpunk 2077
title: CD Projekt RED detalla el contexto político de Cyberpunk 2077
body:
CD Projekt RED detalla el contexto político de Cyberpunk 2077

CD Projekt RED sigue dando pinceladas de lo que será uno de los grandes juegos que están por llegar en 2019 (esperamos): Cyperpunk 2077. En una revista reciente para la Revista Oficial de Xbox, Patrick Mills (diseñador de misioens del juego), explica cual es el contexto político en que se ambienta:

“Cyberpunk 2077 es un juego sobre gente con poder, que está situada en la parte superior, y gente…

CD Projekt RED detalla el contexto político de Cyberpunk 2077

CD Projekt RED sigue dando pinceladas de lo que será uno de los grandes juegos que están por llegar en 2019 (esperamos): Cyperpunk 2077. En una revista reciente para la Revista Oficial de Xbox, Patrick Mills (diseñador de misioens del juego), explica cual es el contexto político en que se ambienta:

“Cyberpunk 2077 es un juego sobre gente con poder, que está situada en la parte superior, y gente…
